message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1300000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1500000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $1200000.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this valuable product. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. This is a compromise that still brings value to both of us, considering its worth to you is $1500000.
I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1250000. This is a fair price that still leaves some room for both of us to benefit.

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to ensure I get a good return on this investment. I'm willing to meet you at $1300000, but I'm not going any lower. This is a fair price that balances both our interests, considering its worth to you is $1500000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1300000, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1220000. This is a fair price that still leaves some room for both of us to benefit.
